review_title: Rewarding work with dedicated and smart colleagues
pros: The opportunity to engage in intellectually stimulating topics, be part of an interntaional team that is mission-driven and cares deeply about US-China relations and environmental protection, and feel that your day to day work is meaningful and making a difference
cons: After a certain point, it can be difficult to grow and get promoted given the size of the organization. The team culture can sometimes be a bit fragmented between offices, but the organization is making big efforts to change that
